winterActivities.title: Ride
winterActivities.text: Verbier is the ultimate ski or snowboard experience. Conveniently located near the slopes, enjoy endless mountain adventures and cozy après-ski comfort.

winterActivities.title: Gear
winterActivities.text: Rent top-quality skis, snowboards, off-piste gear, and skinning equipment, as well as stylish mountain attire to make the most of your adventures.

winterActivities.title: Heliski
winterActivities.text: Take your mountain experience to new heights. Soar above the peaks and enjoy the thrill of untracked powder runs. Book now for an unforgettable adventure.

summerActivities.title: Hike
summerActivities.text: Discover the breathtaking beauty of Verbier's mountains on foot. Enjoy easy access to stunning hiking trails for all levels. Experience nature in its purest form.

summerActivities.title: Trails
summerActivities.text: Discover the thrilling mountain terrain of Verbier on two wheels. With trails for riders of all levels, gear up for an epic mountain biking adventure. Stunning scenery awaits you.

restaurants.title: Caffè Goomah
restaurants.text: Indulge in American-Italian cuisine with a trendy twist at [Restaurant Name]. Savor delicious dishes and craft cocktails in a stylish setting. Book your table and experience dining like a boss.

restaurants.title: Shed. Burgers
restaurants.text: Satisfy your cravings after a long day on the slopes. Enjoy juicy burgers made with top-quality ingredients, paired with crafted cocktails in a relaxed and friendly atmosphere.
